powershell_usage.desc: Review all occurrences of the powershell process being invoked

cscript_wscript.desc: Review all occurrences of wscript or cscript being invoked

mshta.desc: Review all occurrences of mshta being invoked

jp_cert_initial_investigation.query: tasklist.exe OR ipconfig.exe OR systeminfo.exe OR cmdline:query OR cmdline:"net start" OR cmdline:"net time" OR netstat.exe OR whoami OR ver.exe
jp_cert_initial_investigation.desc: JP CERT Initial Investigation: Top Ten

jp_cert_reconnaissance.query: dir.exe OR cmdline:"net view" OR ping.exe OR cmdline:"net use" OR cmdline:"net user" OR cmdline:"net localgroup" OR cmdline:"net group" OR cmdline:"net config" OR cmdline:"net share"

jp_cert_spread_of_infection.query: at.exe OR reg.exe OR wmic.exe OR wusa.exe OR cmdline:netsh OR sc.exe OR rundll32.exe
jp_cert_spread_of_infection.desc: JP CERT Spread of Infection: Top Ten
